tools.name: lookup_booking
tools.description: Fetch the status and summary of a booking given its locator or internal reference.

include_history.description: If true, returns the change log or timeline.

tools.name: check_availability
tools.description: Checks availability for an activity or product on a given date range.

tools.name: end_call
tools.description: Ends the current voice call/session when the user explicitly asks to hang up or finish the conversation.

tools.name: mute_speaker
tools.description: Mutes the assistant audio output so the user stops hearing the voice without ending the call.

tools.name: unmute_speaker
tools.description: Unmutes the assistant audio output so the user can hear the voice again.

tools.name: mute_mic
tools.description: Mutes the user microphone so their audio is not streamed to the assistant.

tools.name: unmute_mic
tools.description: Unmutes the user microphone so their audio is streamed to the assistant again.

tools.name: set_voice
tools.description: Changes the Realtime voice used for audio responses for this session (for example: alloy, verse, ballad, coral, echo, ash).

voice.description: Target voice name (e.g., alloy, verse, ballad, coral, echo, ash).
